name: Gia Saves the Professor
description:
Gia Saves the Professor is a DIY Bullet Hell because the hell is created by you. Each time you throw a gun, bullets are launched on impact. The more guns you throw, the more bullets you'll have to dodge.

This game was made for a game jam from February 23rd to February 25th in 2018. The theme was "Guns, lots of guns."
